Package com.jidesoft.editor.status

The package contains classes for a code editor related status bar items for JIDE Code Editor product.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
CodeEditorStatusBarItem An interface of any StatusBarItem for CodeEditor.
 

Class Summary
AbstractCodeEditorStatusBarItem An abstract implementation of CodeEditorStatusBarItem.
CaretModelPositionStatusBarItem A StatusBarItem to show the caret model position of a CodeEditor.
CaretOffsetStatusBarItem A StatusBarItem to show the caret offset property of a CodeEditor.
CaretOverwriteStatusBarItem A StatusBarItem to show the caret overwrite or insert mode of a CodeEditor.
CaretStatusBarItem A special StatusBarItem which is used to show the information about caret position.
CaretViewPositionStatusBarItem A StatusBarItem to show the caret view position of a CodeEditor.
CodeEditorStatusBar CodeEditorStatusBar is a status bar for CodeEditor.
EditableStatusBarItem A StatusBarItem to show the editable property of a CodeEditor.
LineBreakStatusBarItem A StatusBarItem to show the line break style property of a CodeEditor.
 

Package com.jidesoft.editor.status Description

The package contains classes for a code editor related status bar items for JIDE Code Editor product.
